title: General Knowledge Quiz
description: Test your knowledge across multiple topics

questions.question: Which of the following is the correct format specifier for long int in C?

Which of the following is not a valid C variable name?
What will 5/2 evaluate to in C?
Which of the following is a storage class in C?
Which operator is used to get the memory address of a variable?
Which of the following loops will always execute at least once?
What is the default return type of a function in C, if not specified?
Which keyword is used to prevent modification of a variable in C?
What will printf("%d", 10==10); output?
Which of the following is used to define a constant in C?
What is the size of int in most 32-bit compilers?
Which function is used to allocate memory dynamically in C?
Which function is used to compare two strings in C?
Which of the following is the brain of the computer?
Which type of memory is non-volatile?
Which of the following is an example of secondary storage?
Which of the following is not an input device?
Which of the following is a system software?
Which logic gate gives output 1 if at least one input is 1?
What does BIOS stand for?
The smallest unit of data in computer is:
Which number system is used by computers internally?
Which among the following is a volatile memory?
